name: Open NLP Document Categorizer
description: This node classifies text into pre-defined categories using OpenNLP - https://opennlp.apache.org/documentation/1.7.2/manual/opennlp.html#tools.doccat. It takes in the OpenNLP model. Models can be downloaded from http://opennlp.sourceforge.net/models-1.5/
input: It takes in a DataFrame as input.
output: It finds the Document Category and stores the result in the specified output column.

fields.name: model
fields.title: Model
fields.description: Path to the model file (on HDFS when running on the cluster)
